channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1705; 09:19PM; 5 Kensington Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SQuUge; Northridge; KNOCKDOWN: 42 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. One, single wide mobile home was well involved and impinged on a 2nd unit. Firefighters stopped the fire from extending into the 2nd unit and prevented the fire from damaging the other closely situated homes. No injuries reported. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E103 E104 E107 E273 E287 E290 E73 FO1 RA107 RA70 SO1 T73 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1705; 09:01PM; 5 Kensington Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SQuUge; Northridge; Mobile home park with heavy fire showing from one unit under high winds with multiple units exposed. Additional task force is enroute. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E103 E104 E107 E273 E287 E290 E73 RA107 RA70 T73 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Technical Rescue - FATALITY; INC#0895; 02:04PM; 10340 W Glenbarr Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GckoIG; Cheviot Hills; LADWP de-energized the power lines and firefighters used a ground ladder to reach the adult male patient (estimated to be 30) for a medical assessment. Unfortunately, he was beyond medical help and determined deceased on scene. Firefighters will conduct a body recovery to bring the patient to ground level. The incident will transition to LAPD Inc# 2482 and LA County Medical Examiner-Coroner for the investigation. No further details.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC4 E205 E227 E27 E294 E43 E5 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA57 RA889 SO1 T27 T5 T94 UR27 UR5 UR88; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue; INC#0895; 01:20PM; 10340 W Glenbarr Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GckoIG; Cheviot Hills; Male tree trimmer is stuck approximately 20-25' up a tree, unresponsive and appears to have been electrocuted. Firefighters are preparing for a technical rescue. LADWP is responding to assist with power line management. ; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC4 E227 E27 E294 E43 E5 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA57 RA889 T27 T94 UR27; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0682; 11:36AM; 1904 S Robertson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SSfpVo; Mid-City; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews held the fire to the unit of origin and are performing salvage operations on the unit below due to water flow. The primary and secondary search of the unit found no occupants. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 BC9 CM20 CM22 E261 E292 E294 E43 E58 E94 RA68 RA892 T92 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0682; 11:22AM; 1904 S Robertson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SSfpVo; Mid-City; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 BC9 E261 E292 E294 E43 E58 E94 RA68 RA892 T92 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0127; 03:04AM; 2901 S Palm Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/47HFw5j; West Adams; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. Firefighters located an approximately 60yo female patient who was transported in critical condition. LAFD Arson responding for the investigation per protocol for serious injury. No further details. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E294 E34 E94 RA34 RA894 RA94 T26 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0127; 02:42AM; 2901 S Palm Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/47HFw5j; West Adams; Two story apartment over parking with fire showing from 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E294 E34 E94 RA894 RA94 T26 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Auto vs Ped; INC#1591; 07:15PM; 11036 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46ntwFg; Studio City; Auto versus pedestrian with the patient trapped under the vehicle. Firefighters quickly extricated and are transporting the adult male patient in *at least* serious condition. The original 9-1-1 was received at 7:04PM. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3917 for the investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1292; 04:15PM; 4326 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D6mBoJ; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 11 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters held the fire to one room in a unit on the 1st floor. No further details.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 E215 E226 E294 E34 E46 E94 RA34 RA834 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
